content: I have applied for the Software Engineer position. What's the next step?
Your application is under review. You'll be notified via email.
Your interview is scheduled for March 1st at 10 AM IST.
Can you provide tips for the upcoming interview?
Sure, focus on data structures and algorithms, and review your projects.
I've received an offer. How do I accept it?
You can accept the offer through the portal or contact HR directly.
Can I get feedback on my application?
Yes, HR will provide detailed feedback within a week.
